questions.question: Out of the four polymer types, which one is the most important commercially?

explanations.a: Fibers are important but not the most widely used in commercial applications.
explanations.b: Thermoplastics are the most commercially significant due to their versatility and recyclability.
explanations.c: Elastomers are used in specific applications like tires and seals but less dominant overall.
explanations.d: Thermosets are crucial in structural applications but not as prevalent as thermoplastics.
